title: Font - Water Lilies
content:
Hi everybody,

Please does anyone know the name of the typeface used on this poster for the french movie "Water Lilies" ?

I will be grateful for any help you can provide,

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140702123452im_/http:/typophile.com/files/film_1542_3639.jpg)

Font: 

 AG Schoolbook Two 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20140702123452/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content:
How about: AG Schoolbook Two BQ Medium by Berthold. Gunter Gerhard Lange.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-schoolbook-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140702123452/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-schoolbook-bq/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140702123452im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pier1_4527.jpg)
